meta.description: Determine the optimal number of small and large bouquets to transport to maximize the total number of flowers reaching the stores.

params.name: flowers_per_bouquet
params.description: Number of flowers per bouquet type

objective.name: max_total_flowers
objective.description: Maximize the total number of flowers transported

constraints.name: max_small_bouquets
constraints.description: At most 80 small bouquets can be transported

constraints.name: max_large_bouquets
constraints.description: At most 50 large bouquets can be transported

constraints.name: max_total_bouquets
constraints.description: At most 70 bouquets in total can be transported

constraints.name: min_large_bouquets
constraints.description: At least 20 large bouquets must be transported

constraints.name: min_small_bouquets
constraints.description: At least twice as many small bouquets as large bouquets must be transported
